tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE drug_resistance_tracking (
  pathogen_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(50),
  resistance_level VARCHAR(20),
  data_collected DATE,
  data_source VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE drug_resistance_data ( 
    patient_id INT, 
    pathogen_id INT, 
    resistance_level VARCHAR(50), 
    testing_date DATE, 
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, pathogen_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE surveillance_data (
  record_id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  pathogen_id INT NOT NULL,
  collection_date DATE,
  collected_from VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (record_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (pathogen_id) REFERENCES pathogen_info(pathogen_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResistanceData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT NOT NULL,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    resistance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    resistance_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE drug_resistance (
  resistance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pathogen_id INT NOT NULL,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  resistance_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_recorded DATE
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  dosage VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_prescribed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pathogen_id INT NOT NULL,
  trend_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trend_description TEXT,
  date_start DATE,
  date_end DATE
);
